https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/w1OBPkf3BxeC7543YzFwiKIwBFJ.jpg When New York psychiatrist Bill Capa visits Los Angeles to take over his murdered colleague's therapy group, he finds himself embroiled in the thick of a mystery when he bumps into Rose and begins a torrid affair. Color of Night
